title: Polymorph
blurb: This entity keeps haunting us, even when we are at death's door.
synopsis: An old man on his deathbed reflects on three encounters he had with a mysterious shape-shifting entity throughout his lifetime.

title: Ode to the Void
blurb: A cosmic journey that blurs the boundary between life and death.
synopsis: In the distant future, a military astronaut on the eve of a massive campaign finds himself inexplicably linked to an ancient alien megastructure where he is forced to confront the nature of his own existence.

title: A Princess in Paris
blurb: A love story amidst cruelty and despair.
synopsis: In Nazi-occupied Paris, a teenager falls for a peculiar girl hailing from a mysterious kingdom threatened by the Germans.

title: The Reflection
blurb: Inside The Reach, reality is immaterial.
synopsis: A detective investigates disappearances inside an old power station which serves as a gateway to an oneiric world existing beyond our plane of reality.

title: Ice Rainbow
blurb: In times of fear and paranoia, everything's allowed.
synopsis: As the Cold War reaches its zenith, the stories of a Soviet defector, a CIA agent and US Navy pilots unfold as they attempt to uncover a deeply buried secret out within the expanse of the Bering Sea.

title: The Call From Beyond
blurb: The city bears everything they've ever wanted.
synopsis: Three tales evolve across different centuries where three explorers attempt to find a mystical city they’ve only ever encountered in their dreams.

title: Time Empire
blurb: What if we could change the laws of time?
synopsis: Amidst a strange pandemic, an ailing detective investigates the mysterious disappearance of a woman and her daughter.

title: The Picnic
synopsis: After his girlfriend’s disappearance in a forest where dream, memory and reality are intertwined, a man tries to reconnect with her by returning to the area and hopefully vanquishing his demons.

title: Wicked Crossings
blurb: You wouldn't wish this on your worst enemy.
synopsis: Within an inescapable labyrinthine ghost town, a man assumes multiple identities whilst being chased by unknown assailants.

title: Assimilation
blurb: The truth lies on the surface.
synopsis: Within a post-apocalyptic Earth, a man embarks on a quest to unravel the mysteries behind the world's downfall through visions of someone who lived before the apocalypse.

title: The Palace of Dr. Remarde
synopsis: Several eccentric characters (and a sheep) find themselves at a party in a palace governed by strange rules of reality and overseen by a God-like presence who seems to be tied to the characters’ misfortune.
